response: "{ \"title\": \"Number of Subarrays with Equal Sum\", \"description\": \"Given a list of integers, write a function `count_subarrays` that counts the number of subarrays with equal sum.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef count_subarray(s: list) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `s` (list): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the number of subarrays in the input list that have equal sum.\", \"code\": \"from collections import defaultdict\\n\\ndef count_subarrays(s: list) -> int:\\n    n = len(s)\\n    hashmap = defaultdict(int)\\n    total_sum = 0\\n    for i, num in enumerate(s):\\n        total_sum += num\\n        if hashmap[total_sum % (i + 1)] == 0:\\n            hashmap[total_sum % (i + 1)] = 1\\n        else:\\n            hashmap[total_sum % (i + 1)] += 1\\n    return sum(hashmap.values()) - 1\", \"tests\": [\"assert count_subarrays([5, 6, 0]) == 3\", \"assert count_subarrays([-1, -2, 1, 1]) == 4\", \"assert count_subarrays([]) == 0\"] }"
